<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Def: Val &lt;- NewDefs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Same number of values: copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Different number: Val = build&#95;sequence Defs1, Defs2, ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use: NewSources &lt;- Val.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Same number of values: copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     Different number: Src1, Src2, ... =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           extract&#95;value Val, Src1Begin, Src1Len, Src2Begin, Src2Len, ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We should remember that this value is available somewhere else to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// coalesce the value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we need splitting for phis, that means it is because we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could not find an insertion point before the terminators of</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isPHI() || !MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a75eb135014670ce946e78739cdc9b51b">isDef</a>()) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Need split for phi def?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We split to repair the use of a phi or a terminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a75eb135014670ce946e78739cdc9b51b">isDef</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isTerminator()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> != &amp;(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;getFirstTerminator()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Need to split for the first terminator?!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the PHI case, the split may not be actually required.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the copy case, a phi is already a copy on the incoming edge,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// therefore there is no need to split.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValMapping.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping/#a83b9746150eb1c8820d65bca34b8d950">NumBreakDowns</a> == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a already a copy, there is nothing to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RepairPt.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#adb2d45f98e7457256296b0943ddd4a6c">switchTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6a756e97b1942ca89260909cfdfb64b957">RepairingPlacement::RepairingKind::Reassign</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At this point, we need to repair a defintion of a terminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Technically we need to fix the def of MI on all outgoing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// edges of MI to keep the repairing local. In other words, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will create several definitions of the same register. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// does not work for SSA unless that definition is a physical</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, there are other cases where we can get away with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that while still keeping the repairing local.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isTerminator() &amp;&amp; MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a75eb135014670ce946e78739cdc9b51b">isDef</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;This code is for the def of a terminator&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since we use RPO traversal, if we need to repair a definition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this means this definition could be:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 Used by PHIs (i.e., this VReg has been visited as part of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    uses of a phi.), or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 Part of a target specific instruction (i.e., the target applied</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    some register class constraints when creating the instruction.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the constraints come for #2, the target said that another mapping</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is supported so we may just drop them. Indeed, if we do not change</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the number of registers holding that value, the uses will get fixed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when we get to them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Uses in PHIs may have already been proceeded though.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the constraints come for #1, then, those are weak constraints and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// no actual uses may rely on them. However, the problem remains mainly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same as for #2. If the value stays in one register, we could</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// just switch the register bank of the definition, but we would need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// account for a repairing cost for each phi we silently change.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In any case, if the value needs to be broken down into several</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers, the repairing is not local anymore as we need to patch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// every uses to rebuild the value in just one register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To summarize:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - If the value is in a physical register, we can do the split and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   fix locally.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise if the value is in a virtual register:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - If the value remains in one register, we do not have to split</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   just switching the register bank would do, but we need to account</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   in the repairing cost all the phi we changed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - If the value spans several registers, then we cannot do a local</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   repairing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if this is a physical or virtual register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg = MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Reg.isPhysical()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are going to split every outgoing edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that this is possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: The machine representation is currently broken</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// since it also several terminators in one basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because of that we would technically need a way to get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the targets of just one terminator to know which edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we have to split.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assert that we do not hit the ill-formed representation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are other terminators before that one, some of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the outgoing edges may not be dominated by this definition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> == &amp;(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;getFirstTerminator()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Do not know which outgoing edges are relevant&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNextNode();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the next terminator uses Reg, this means we have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to split right after MI and thus we need a way to ask</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a>-&gt;readsRegister(Reg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;TRI=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Need to split between terminators&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We will split all the edges and repair there.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a virtual register defined by a terminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValMapping.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping/#a83b9746150eb1c8820d65bca34b8d950">NumBreakDowns</a> == 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is nothing to repair, but we may actually lie on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the repairing cost because of the PHIs already proceeded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as already stated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Though the code will be correct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Repairing cost may not be accurate&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to do non-local repairing. Basically, patch all</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For now, just say this mapping is not possible.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If mapped with InstrMapping, MI will have the recorded cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost">MappingCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#a229ce6916aecf746e69143476a1e5686">MBFI</a> ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#a229ce6916aecf746e69143476a1e5686">MBFI</a>-&gt;getBlockFreq(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a>(1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Saturated = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.addLocalCost(InstrMapping.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/instructionmapping/#a4c1c4a80c61e8df88647f78ddf6de94e">getCost</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#ad8501c8e8cf2d5ffaa86880f57cd4569">MRI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getMF()-&gt;getRegInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Moreover, to realize this mapping, the register bank of each operand must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// match this mapping. In other words, we may need to locally reassign the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">       OpIdx != EndOpIdx; ++OpIdx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(OpIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Opd&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; OpIdx &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Reg is already properly mapped, this is free.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Assign;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RepairPts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a396fcfee6914c76974b73c3d203da6a5">emplace&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement">RepairingPlacement</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, OpIdx, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#a98f7afadeec4309cbce64ca040635c04">TRI</a>, &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the insertion point for the repairing code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RepairPts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a396fcfee6914c76974b73c3d203da6a5">emplace&#95;back</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement">RepairingPlacement</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, OpIdx, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#a98f7afadeec4309cbce64ca040635c04">TRI</a>, &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#a66bdd17ee82024ea0ccbb0288b379dd6a07b4fac858ad8fc2c4d9bdc7acd6e195">RepairingPlacement::Insert</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement">RepairingPlacement</a> &amp;RepairPt = RepairPts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we need to split a basic block to materialize this insertion point,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we may give a higher cost to this mapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Nevertheless, we may get away with the split, so try that first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RepairPt.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#a05dcab804adfa11b36715dddba6c52db">hasSplit</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#a781bc33cca080506ba19a20d66c1c255">tryAvoidingSplit</a>(RepairPt, MO, ValMapping);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the materialization of the repairing is possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!RepairPt.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#a39535988981c86b512949745cbfab81c">canMaterialize</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Mapping involves impossible repairing\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">MappingCost::ImpossibleCost</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Account for the split cost and repair cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unless the cost is already saturated or we do not care about the cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BestCost || Saturated)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To get accurate information we need MBFI and MBPI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Thus, if we end up here this information should be here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#a229ce6916aecf746e69143476a1e5686">MBFI</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#ab5b60d048f9e03018f15f3730cb24921">MBPI</a> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cost computation requires MBFI and MBPI&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: We will have to rework the repairing cost model.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The repairing cost depends on the register bank that MO has.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, when we break down the value into different values,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MO may not have a register bank while still needing repairing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the fast mode, we don&#39;t compute the cost so that is fine,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but still for the repairing code, we will have to make a choice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the greedy mode, we should choose greedily what is the best</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// choice based on the next use of MO.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sums up the repairing cost of MO at each insertion point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t RepairCost = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#ac3cfa17f907e7258d898433ddfeb3fbf">getRepairCost</a>(MO, ValMapping);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is an impossible to repair cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RepairCost == std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;unsigned&gt;::max())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">MappingCost::ImpossibleCost</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bias used for splitting: 5%.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t PercentageForBias = 5;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Bias = (RepairCost &#42; PercentageForBias + 99) / 100;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We should not need more than a couple of instructions to repair</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an assignment. In other words, the computation should not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overflow because the repairing cost is free of basic block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// frequency.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(((RepairCost &lt; RepairCost &#42; PercentageForBias) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (RepairCost &#42; PercentageForBias &lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">             RepairCost &#42; PercentageForBias + 99)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Repairing involves more than a billion of instructions?!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;InsertPoint&gt; &amp;InsertPt : RepairPt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(InsertPt-&gt;canMaterialize() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;We should not have made it here&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We will applied some basic block frequency and those uses uint64&#95;t.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InsertPt-&gt;isSplit())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Saturated = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.addLocalCost(RepairCost);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t CostForInsertPt = RepairCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Again we shouldn&#39;t overflow here givent that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CostForInsertPt is frequency free at this point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CostForInsertPt + Bias &gt; CostForInsertPt &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Repairing + split bias overflows&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CostForInsertPt += Bias;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t PtCost = InsertPt-&gt;frequency(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#42; CostForInsertPt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we just overflowed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Saturated = PtCost &lt; CostForInsertPt))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.saturate();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Saturated = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.addNonLocalCost(PtCost);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stop looking into what it takes to repair, this is already</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// too expensive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BestCost &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &gt; &#42;BestCost) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Mapping is too expensive, stop processing\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No need to accumulate more cost information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to still gather the repairing information though.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Saturated)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Total cost is: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, place the repairing code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement">RepairingPlacement</a> &amp;RepairPt : RepairPts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!RepairPt.canMaterialize() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Other kind should not happen&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The only correct mapping for these is to always use the source register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bank.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbank">RegisterBank</a> &#42;RB =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RB &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected source register to have a register bank?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Repairings for definitions happen after MI, uses happen before.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/standardinstrumentations-cpp/#a6f1bbcae7288f05872dcfe811d0388baa9060587edeb01a63e3d3edc959678d1e">Before</a> = !MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a75eb135014670ce946e78739cdc9b51b">isDef</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we are done with MI.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are done with the initialization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, look for the special cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isPHI()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - PHI must be the first instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; Before, we have to split the related incoming edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; After, move the insertion point past the last phi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/standardinstrumentations-cpp/#a6f1bbcae7288f05872dcfe811d0388baa9060587edeb01a63e3d3edc959678d1e">Before</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> It = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;getFirstNonPHI();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#afc878eab773e206b796e5b9790343a8e">addInsertPoint</a>(&#42;It, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Before&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#afc878eab773e206b796e5b9790343a8e">addInsertPoint</a>(&#42;(--It), </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Before&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We repair a use of a phi, we may need to split the related edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;Pred = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(OpIdx + 1).getMBB();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we can move the insertion point prior to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// terminators of the predecessor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg = MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> It = Pred.getLastNonDebugInstr();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Begin = Pred.begin(); It != Begin &amp;&amp; It-&gt;isTerminator(); --It)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It-&gt;modifiesRegister(Reg, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#a98f7afadeec4309cbce64ca040635c04">TRI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot hoist the repairing code in the predecessor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split the edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#afc878eab773e206b796e5b9790343a8e">addInsertPoint</a>(Pred, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At this point, we can insert in Pred.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - If It is invalid, Pred is empty and we can insert in Pred</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   wherever we want.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - If It is valid, It is the first non-terminator, insert after It.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It == Pred.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#afc878eab773e206b796e5b9790343a8e">addInsertPoint</a>(Pred, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Beginning&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#afc878eab773e206b796e5b9790343a8e">addInsertPoint</a>(&#42;It, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Before&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Terminators must be the last instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; Before, move the insert point before the first terminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#42; After, we have to split the outcoming edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/standardinstrumentations-cpp/#a6f1bbcae7288f05872dcfe811d0388baa9060587edeb01a63e3d3edc959678d1e">Before</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether Reg is defined by any terminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#abada92f8cd2854d2b747f14c4a7be0ed">MachineBasicBlock::reverse&#95;iterator</a> It = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> REnd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;rend();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; It != REnd &amp;&amp; It-&gt;isTerminator(); ++It) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!It-&gt;modifiesRegister(MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>(), &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#a98f7afadeec4309cbce64ca040635c04">TRI</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;copy insertion in middle of terminators not handled&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It == REnd) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#afc878eab773e206b796e5b9790343a8e">addInsertPoint</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;begin(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are sure to be right before the first terminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement/#afc878eab773e206b796e5b9790343a8e">addInsertPoint</a>(&#42;It, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;Before&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure Reg is not redefined by other terminators, otherwise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we do not know how to split.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> It = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, End = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">         ++It != End;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The machine verifier should reject this kind of code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(It-&gt;modifiesRegister(MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>(), &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/#a98f7afadeec4309cbce64ca040635c04">TRI</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Do not know where to split&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split each outcoming edges.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  InsertPoints.emplace&#95;back(&amp;Point);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/instrinsertpoint/#a6cc84b9482ccab01341e9694c14933d7"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/instrinsertpoint/#a6cc84b9482ccab01341e9694c14933d7">RegBankSelect::InstrInsertPoint::InstrInsertPoint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;Instr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Before)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : Instr(Instr), Before(Before) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since we do not support splitting, we do not need to update</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// liveness and such, so do not do anything with P.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!Before || !Instr.isPHI()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Splitting before phis requires more points&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!Before || !Instr.getNextNode() || !Instr.getNextNode()-&gt;isPHI()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Splitting between phis does not make sense&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/insertpoint/#ad8275ad73d60d460541c51e9c11ddf7d">RegBankSelect::InstrInsertPoint::materialize</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isSplit()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Slice and return the beginning of the new block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we need to split between the terminators, we theoritically</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to know where the first and second set of terminators end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to update the successors properly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, in pratice, we should have a maximum of 2 branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions; one conditional and one unconditional. Therefore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we know how to update the successor by looking at the target of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the unconditional branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we end up splitting at some point, then, we should update</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the liveness information and such. I.e., we would need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// access P here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The machine verifier should actually make sure such cases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cannot happen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Not yet implemented&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise the insertion point is just the current or next</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction depending on Before. I.e., there is nothing to do</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/instrinsertpoint/#a8bf99289cea710aff85335a6cc7aefb6"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/instrinsertpoint/#a8bf99289cea710aff85335a6cc7aefb6">RegBankSelect::InstrInsertPoint::isSplit</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the insertion point is after a terminator, we need to split.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Before)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instr.isTerminator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we insert before an instruction that is after a terminator,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we are still after a terminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instr.getPrevNode() &amp;&amp; Instr.getPrevNode()-&gt;isTerminator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/instrinsertpoint/#acfe02f412f4221fbb6a31ca758ac297e"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/instrinsertpoint/#acfe02f412f4221fbb6a31ca758ac297e">RegBankSelect::InstrInsertPoint::frequency</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Even if we need to split, because we insert between terminators,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this split has actually the same frequency as the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mbfiwrapper">MBFIWrapper</a> =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mbfiwrapper">MBFIWrapper</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mbfiwrapper/#afc8a10ff1df27bad8713e0d2b020f3e3">getMBFI</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineblockfrequencyinfo/#a7dd7fa8c0a91118934b08b516b6e9d37">getBlockFreq</a>(Instr.getParent()).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency/#a8e9ed6b20c2503f66f1fd0725297aedc">getFrequency</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/insertpoint/#ad8275ad73d60d460541c51e9c11ddf7d">RegBankSelect::EdgeInsertPoint::materialize</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we end up repairing twice at the same place before materializing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insertion point, we may think we have to split an edge twice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We should have a factory for the insert point such that identical points</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are the same instance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Src.isSuccessor(DstOrSplit) &amp;&amp; DstOrSplit-&gt;isPredecessor(&amp;Src) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;This point has already been split&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;NewBB = Src.SplitCriticalEdge(DstOrSplit, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NewBB &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid call to materialize&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We reuse the destination block to hold the information of the new block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DstOrSplit = NewBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
