<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a71e543f0b1123c8f580ef5451e500b55"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a71e543f0b1123c8f580ef5451e500b55">RegBankSelect::MappingCost::addLocalCost</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegBankSelect::MappingCost::isSaturated()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LocalCost == <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a> - 1 &amp;&amp; NonLocalCost == <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">         LocalFreq == <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a2b676e3c4e68d0e102c861e6fc2233c2"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a2b676e3c4e68d0e102c861e6fc2233c2">RegBankSelect::MappingCost::saturate</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">ImpossibleCost</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">  --LocalCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost">RegBankSelect::MappingCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">RegBankSelect::MappingCost::ImpossibleCost</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MappingCost(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#aa0252d6f02b3a363b68e4438db3f82a7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#aa0252d6f02b3a363b68e4438db3f82a7">RegBankSelect::MappingCost::operator&lt;</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MappingCost &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sort out the easy cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If one is impossible to realize the other is cheaper unless it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// impossible as well.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">ImpossibleCost</a>()) || (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">ImpossibleCost</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">ImpossibleCost</a>()) &lt; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">ImpossibleCost</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If one is saturated the other is cheaper, unless it is saturated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as well.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isSaturated() || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.isSaturated())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isSaturated() &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.isSaturated();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At this point we know both costs hold sensible values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If both values have a different base frequency, there is no much</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we can do but to scale everything.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, if they have the same base frequency we can avoid making</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// complicated computation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t ThisLocalAdjust;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t OtherLocalAdjust;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#ae5b35beb6f127e5f47269e9124b886fb">LLVM&#95;LIKELY</a>(LocalFreq == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalFreq)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At this point, we know the local costs are comparable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do the case that do not involve potential overflow first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NonLocalCost == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.NonLocalCost)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since the non-local costs do not discriminate on the result,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// just compare the local costs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LocalCost &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The base costs are comparable so we may only keep the relative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value to increase our chances of avoiding overflows.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ThisLocalAdjust = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OtherLocalAdjust = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LocalCost &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OtherLocalAdjust = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost - LocalCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ThisLocalAdjust = LocalCost - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ThisLocalAdjust = LocalCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OtherLocalAdjust = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The non-local costs are comparable, just keep the relative value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t ThisNonLocalAdjust = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t OtherNonLocalAdjust = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NonLocalCost &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.NonLocalCost)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OtherNonLocalAdjust = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.NonLocalCost - NonLocalCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ThisNonLocalAdjust = NonLocalCost - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.NonLocalCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scale everything to make them comparable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t ThisScaledCost = ThisLocalAdjust &#42; LocalFreq;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for overflow on that operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ThisOverflows = ThisLocalAdjust &amp;&amp; (ThisScaledCost &lt; ThisLocalAdjust ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           ThisScaledCost &lt; LocalFreq);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t OtherScaledCost = OtherLocalAdjust &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalFreq;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for overflow on the last operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OtherOverflows =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OtherLocalAdjust &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (OtherScaledCost &lt; OtherLocalAdjust || OtherScaledCost &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalFreq);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the non-local costs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ThisOverflows |= ThisNonLocalAdjust &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   ThisScaledCost + ThisNonLocalAdjust &lt; ThisNonLocalAdjust;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ThisScaledCost += ThisNonLocalAdjust;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OtherOverflows |= OtherNonLocalAdjust &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    OtherScaledCost + OtherNonLocalAdjust &lt; OtherNonLocalAdjust;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OtherScaledCost += OtherNonLocalAdjust;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If both overflows, we cannot compare without additional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// precision, e.g., APInt. Just give up on that case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ThisOverflows &amp;&amp; OtherOverflows)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If one overflows but not the other, we can still compare.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ThisOverflows || OtherOverflows)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ThisOverflows &lt; OtherOverflows;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, just compare the values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ThisScaledCost &lt; OtherScaledCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a4ff1832629e69da1b5cf274d68a578c3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a4ff1832629e69da1b5cf274d68a578c3">RegBankSelect::MappingCost::operator==</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MappingCost &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LocalCost == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalCost &amp;&amp; NonLocalCost == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.NonLocalCost &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">         LocalFreq == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.LocalFreq;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if !defined(NDEBUG) || defined(LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;DUMP)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7560fb1f9f314cb11cdc7761f21ad3d8"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#aa863693eef567397d9c292da5bf22d34">LLVM&#95;DUMP&#95;METHOD</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7560fb1f9f314cb11cdc7761f21ad3d8">RegBankSelect::MappingCost::dump</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a50bf746ca1858c0e272e3a802fc27942">print</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#acfb4953eaf1304ed97bc52250a3196da"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#acfb4953eaf1304ed97bc52250a3196da">RegBankSelect::MappingCost::print</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost/#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">ImpossibleCost</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OS &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;impossible&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isSaturated()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OS &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;saturated&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS &lt;&lt; LocalFreq &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &#42; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; LocalCost &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; + &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; NonLocalCost;</span></CodeLine>
